授業目的:
The purposes of this course are:
1. To help students improve their vocabulary and grammar with a particular focus on academic writing, as opposed to colloquial English,
2. To provide students with a fundamental understanding of the discourse of essay writing, To engage students in writing connected to their respective fields of study,
3. To provide students with practice in using cited research and quotations in academic writing while avoiding plagiarism, and
4. To engage students in writing for fluency through a variety of topics.
到達目標:
At the end of each semester, students should be able to write an effective essay in English. Students are expected to be able to write a structured essay with an Introduction Paragraph (Background, Thesis Statement, and Outline), well-supported and clear Body Paragraphs (Topic Sentence, Supporting Sentences, and a Concluding Sentence), and a Conclusion Paragraph (Restatement of Thesis Statement and Summary). Based on the basic knowledge and skills for writing essays and with the help of research, students will be able to write researched essays in their respective fields of study. They should also be able to demonstrate written proficiency in English grammar and punctuation via feedback from the instructor.
Note: Essay(s) will contain evidence of cited research and a reference list written in accordance with IEEE guidelines.
